name:
Nintendo Badge Arcade:
Update
description:
An update for Nintendo Badge Arcade is now available from Nintendo eShop.

All customers who own a copy of Nintendo Badge Arcade should download the update.

This will update the software to Version 1.3.1 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.

â€¢ Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
